author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces some configuration updates in view of preparing a cmsDriver test workflow based on DD4hep, following a request by @ianna . The code is not yet mature for a regular insertion in PyReleaseValidation, so I add a simple script to ```Geometry/CMSCommonData/test/dd4hep``` with the step1 cmsDriver command for a SingleMuon test workflow based on the 2021 DD4hep geometry made available.

In order to interface this seamlessly with ```ConfigBuilder.py``` without ad-hoc hacks, I update the name of ```DD4hep_GeometrySim_cff``` to the more standard ```GeometryDD4hepExtended2021_cff```, add a Reco counterpart of it, and plug this into ```Configuration/StandardSequences/python/GeometryConf_cff``` so as to let ```ConfigBuilder.py``` to pick it from the command line in a standard way.

The Reco configuration needs to be adapted further, as the test workflow is crashing in the HCAL part: @bsunanda do you see what is wrong?

At the same time I move the process modifier ```dd4hep_cff``` from ```Configuration/Eras``` where I had originally accepted it to ```Configuration/ProcessModifiers``` as it looks a more suitable location to me, in the spirit of #22718 . The places where this is added so far by @bsunanda are updated accordingly, and its use is also extended to the ```g4SimHits``` declaration.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, a test configuration is created but fails at runtime. It may be used to progressively test the completion of a geometry configuration fully operational for DD4hep.
title: cmsDriver Test workflow based on DD4hep: first steps
